allow: Bash(if [ -f nanoclaw.pid ]; then cat nanoclaw.pid | xargs ps -p 2>/dev/null && echo "Process is running"; else echo "No PID file"; fi)
Bash(kill 85026 && sleep 2 && pgrep -f "nanoclaw" || echo "No nanoclaw process running")
Bash(gh repo view openclaw/openclaw --json description,name 2>/dev/null || echo "Using WebFetch instead")
Bash(sqlite3 data/nanoclaw.db "SELECT * FROM chats LIMIT 10;" 2>/dev/null || echo "DB query failed")
Bash(sqlite3 data/nanoclaw.db ".tables" 2>/dev/null || echo "DB might not have tables")
Bash(sqlite3 store/messages.db "SELECT * FROM registered_groups;" 2>/dev/null || echo "Query failed")
Bash(sqlite3 store/messages.db "UPDATE registered_groups SET name='NanoClaw Team', folder='nanoclaw-team' WHERE jid='tg:-5212129876';")
Bash(sqlite3 store/messages.db "SELECT * FROM registered_groups WHERE jid='tg:-5212129876';")
Bash(sqlite3 store/messages.db "SELECT id, sender, content, timestamp FROM messages WHERE chat_jid='tg:-5212129876' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(sqlite3 store/messages.db "UPDATE registered_groups SET requires_trigger = NULL WHERE jid='tg:-5212129876';")
Bash(sqlite3 store/messages.db "SELECT jid, name, folder, requires_trigger FROM registered_groups WHERE jid='tg:-5212129876';")
Bash(pgrep -f "nanoclaw" && ps aux | grep -E "node.*nanoclaw|nanoclaw.*dist" | grep -v grep)
